General.Name: MCC Meili Paper Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: MCC Meili Cloud Computing Industry Investment Co., Ltd engages in the production and sale of paper products in China. It's paper business offers cultural and colored papers, such as colored cultural paper and colored packaging papers; chemical paper comprising offset paper, electrostatic copy paper, etc., which are used for books, periodicals, teaching materials for primary and secondary schools, and office paper; and color offset paper, color copy paper, color card and pearl base paper, etc., used in office, printing, handicrafts, and high-end packaging. The company's data center business provides rack rental and operation, network access, and maintenance services for large Internet companies, government, enterprise, and telecom operators. In addition, the company operates photovoltaic project for solar power generation and sale of solar products. MCC Meili Cloud Computing Industry Investment Co. was formerly known as MCC Meili Paper Co., Ltd. and changed its name to MCC Meili Cloud Computing Industry Investment Co. in July 2016. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Zhongwei, China.
